alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 1:36AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Jackson and northeastern Bennett Counties through 215 AM MDT... At 136 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles west of Eagle Nest Butte, or 20 miles north of Martin, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Long Valley and Eagle Nest Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm is producing large quantities of hail. Driving through deep hail is like driving on slushy roads. Slow down and do not brake suddenly.
